home.mast_title: Quickly and easily turn your website into an app!
home.mast_tag: Enter the URL of your website below.
home.empty_tag: With Progressive Web Apps (or simply PWAs) you don't have to decide between using cross-platform web technologies and providing your users with a native app-like experience.
home.how_works_body: A Progressive Web App (or simply PWA) is a web site that acts, looks, and feels like a native app. Your web app runs in a browser just like it does today, but on platforms that support it, the app can be installed on the device and have the behavior and privlages of a native app.
home.how_works_body_2: Why build native apps for every platform when your PWA can run on iOS, Windows, Android, and now MacOS
home.what_makes_body: A good PWA is indistinguishable from a good native app.  A good PWA works whether you are connected to the internet or working offline, on a phone or a powerful PC, and works great with a mouse as well as touch.  But don't stop at good, we can help make your PWA great!
home.quality_mid_list_1: Service worker for performance and offline
home.quality_mid_list_3: Works with different inputs and screen sizes

footer.copyright: PWABuilder was founded by Microsoft as a community guided, open source project to help move PWA adoption forward.

generator.title: Provide a URL
generator.subtitle: Provide your URL and we'll help fill in the gaps if there are any.
generator.skip_description: If you already have the Manifest and want to download the service worker source code you can skip the first step.

generate.subtitle: Your W3C Manifest
generate.instructions: You can use our tools to enhance your manifest, and download or copy the results for your site.
generate.name: Name
generate.specify_application: Specify related applications to be added to the manifest.
generate.specify_members: Specify custom members to be added to the manifest.
generate.generate_missing: Generate missing images from this image

serviceworker.title: Service Worker
serviceworker.summary: Service workers can make your site work offline, run faster, or both. Choose the functionality from our service workers below.

titles.offline_copy_backup: Offline copy with Backup offline page

descriptions.offline_page: This simple but elegant solution pulls a file from your web server called "offline.html" (make sure that file is actually there) and serves the file whenever a network connection can not be made.
descriptions.offline_copy: A solution that expands the offline capabilities of your app. A copy of each pages is stored in the cache as your visitors view them. This allows a visitor to load any previously viewed page while they are offline.
descriptions.offline_copy_backup: A copy of each pages is stored in the cache as your visitors view them. This allows a visitor to load any previously viewed page while they are offline. This then adds the "offline page" that allows you to customize the message and experience if the app is offline, and the page is not in the cache.
descriptions.cache_first: Use this service worker to pre-cache content. The content you add to the "cache-array" will be added immediately to the cache and service from the cache whenever a page requests it. At the same time it will update the cache with the version you have on the server. Configure your file array to include all your site files, or a subset that you want to be served quickly.
descriptions.advanced: Use this service worker to improve the performance of your app, and make it work offline. The advanced pre-cache allows you to configure files and routes that are cached in different manners (pre-cache, server first, cache first etc). The tool can be used to build a lightening fast app (even for dynamic content) that works offline.

publish.title: Publish PWA
publish.manifest_needed: You need to create your manifest first.
publish.web_description: Download these files and add them to your website.  Different browsers will detect your Progressive Web App in different ways, but the manifest and service workers are required for each of them.
publish.windows_description: Service Worker support requires RS4 or above.  The Download button below will create a copy of each PWAbuilder component as well as a side-loadable version your PWA (requires win10 in dev mode).  The Generate Appx button can be used to generate a PWA package to submit to the Microsoft Store.
publish.android_description: PWAs are available through the browser on Android, however your PWA can also be submitted to the play store by submitting the package you get below.
publish.publisher_details: details below in order to generate an AppX package you can upload to the store.
publish.placeholder_publisher: Enter a Name or Company Name
publish.label_publisher_id: Found under Account Settings, Windows Publisher ID.
publish.placeholder_package: Enter a valid Package Identity Name

generatormenu.title: Generate your Progressive Web App
generatormenu.subtitle: PWA.tools takes data from your site and uses that to generate cross-platform Progressive Web Apps

windows.title: Be the Best PWA you can be with advanced APIs
windows.summary: now that you are a pwa, you should take advantage of app-like features that will win over your users.
